sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_INT_MEDIA_SEARCH_SEQ from dual
insert into RG_INT_MEDIA_SEARCH ( INTERNET_MEDIA_SEARCH_ID, CASE_ID, SUBJECT_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID, LOCAL_MEDIA_IND, UPDATED_ON, UPDATED_BY, NOTES, RESEARCH_DOC_ID, SAME_NAME_IND, SOURCE1, SOURCE2, SOURCE3, DATE1, DATE2, DATE3, ISSUE_HEADING, ISSUE_SUMMARY, HEADLINE, ARTICLE_TEXT, REPORT_INCLUDE_IND, PRINT_ORDER, RESEARCH_DATE, SHOW_SUPPORT_DOCS, TEAM_ID, LOCK_ARRANGMENT_IND, IS_AUTO_SAVED )values ( #id#, #crn#, #subjectId#, #processCycleId#, 'N' sysdate, #updateBy#, #tableBottomNotes#, #rdNumber#, #sameNameSubject#, #source1#, #source2#, #source3#, #date1#, #date2#, #date3#, #issueOfHeadline# #issueOfSummary#, #headline#, #article#, #includeExcludeIdentifire#, null, sysdate, 'N', #teamTypeId#, 'N', 'N' )
